html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-06602023-06-23TC
ActTransportation of Dangerous Goods Act, 1992
SubjectRegulations Amending the Transportation of Dangerous Goods Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending the TRANSPORTATION OF DANGEROUS GOODS REGULATIONS (Miscellaneous Program) in order to (1) repeal obsolete regulatory provisions that have no current application; (2) correct discrepancies between the French and English versions; (3) harmonize terms used in the Regulations with those used in the Act or related regulations; (4) clarify existing provisions; (5) correct typographical, grammatical, spelling, numbering, and punctuation errors; and (6) update references to standards and other documents incorporated by reference.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0155 Publication Date: 2023-07-05
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Transportation of Dangerous Goods Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
precis: Regulations Amending the TRANSPORTATION OF DANGEROUS GOODS REGULATIONS (Miscellaneous Program) in order to (1) repeal obsolete regulatory provisions that have no current application; (2) correct discrepancies between the French and English versions; (3) harmonize terms used in the Regulations with those used in the Act or related regulations; (4) clarify existing provisions; (5) correct typographical, grammatical, spelling, numbering, and punctuation errors; and (6) update references to standards and other documents incorporated by reference.
